main event: A UFO was observed over Eddyville, Broken Bow, and Miller, Nebraska on September 9, 1958, displaying a group of rotating lights.
interesting points: The object was larger than a normal aircraft and moved much slower than expected,The lights were observed rotating counter-clockwise,The UFO was stationary for approximately three hours before slowly rising and moving south-east, Observers included housewives and a postal mailman from Eddyville, The final disappearance of the object was not observed, leading to inconclusive results.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with rotating lights
witness description: Observers included housewives and a postal mailman, all trained observers
